page.title: 05NAIRN:DELNIES SCHOOL
page.content: Delnies Primary School was opened on the 5th July 1875.It was only a little thatched cottage then. There are only 44 pupils of both sexes. There are 4 classes and the subjects are english, arithmetic, needlework, art, reading, crafts and music.Primary 3 and 4 get history and geography. The children range from 4 to 9 years old. There are 2 classrooms,1 large and 1 small.The large room is used as a classroom, a dinner hall and a gym hall.School dinners cost 50 pence.Each year they have{sports}which are held in Tradespark Playing Field. For misbehaving the punishments are a good row,deprived of playtime and put to staffroom. Delnies school is{closing down}on the 28th June,the children going to either Rosebank or Millbank.
